imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

tag.description: controller image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

replicaCount.description: Number of controller replicas to deploy

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

limits.description: The resources limits for the controller containers

requests.description: The requested resources for the controller containers

fsGroup.description: Set controller pod's Security Context fsGroup

runAsUser.description: Set controller containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsNonRoot.description: Set controller containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

existingConfigmap.description: The name of an existing ConfigMap with your custom configuration for controller

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `controller.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `controller.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `controller.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `controller.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `controller.affinity` is set

enableAffinity.description: If enabled Affinity for controller pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for controller pods assignment

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for controller pods

lifecycleHooks.description: for the controller container(s) to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to controller nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for controller nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for controller nodes

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the controller pod(s)

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the controller container(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the controller pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the controller pod(s)

enabled.description: Create a service for accessing the metrics endpoint

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

loadBalancerIP.description: controller metrics service Load Balancer IP

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: controller metrics service Load Balancer sources

externalTrafficPolicy.description: controller metrics service external traffic policy

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for controller metrics service

enabled.description: Specify if a servicemonitor will be deployed for prometheus-operator

jobLabel.description: Specify the jobLabel to use for the prometheus-operator

scrapeTimeout.description: Timeout after which the scrape is ended

interval.description: Scrape interval. If not set, the Prometheus default scrape interval is used

additionalLabels.description: Used to pass Labels that are required by the installed Prometheus Operator

replicaCount.description: Number of store replicas to deploy
